description: Defines a Flutter widget 'BookDetailsScreen' that displays detailed information about a specific book, including its image, title, author, rating, price, categories, and an 'Add to Cart' button.

classes.name: BookDetailsScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that presents detailed information about a book identified by 'id', including handling cases where the book is not found.

methods.name: _find
methods.description: Searches the 'sampleBooks' list for a book with a matching 'id'. Returns the book if found, otherwise null.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for displaying book details, including book image, title, author, rating, categories, and an 'Add to Cart' button.
